Text:
Congratulations on not providing an option that has subtitles only for foreign languages (i.e. not english) and location information, and instead only providing an option that subtitles the ENTIRE MOVIE. 

There's a difference between providing subtitles that actually came with the movie, and providing subtitles for DEAF PEOPLE. Apparently, Atlas47 doesn't understand the difference. 

Don't waste your time downloading this torrent. And people like Atlas47 deserve to lose their symbol.

Excellent rip A:10 V:10
Thank you uploader!
